title: book_Understanding_the_Lord_of_the_Rings
text:
ISBN-13: 9780618422531.
ISBN-10: 0618422536.
Title: Understanding the Lord of the Rings.
Subtitle: The Best of Tolkien Criticism.
Authors: Neil D. Isaacs;Rose A. Zimbardo.
Categories: Literary Criticism.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=GEWXQbASXZUC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Selected essays on Tolkien's trilogy include W. H. Auden's essay on the hero's quest, C. S. Lewis's piece on the value of myth, Marion Zimmer Bradley's article on hero worship, Tim Shippey's piece on the film trilogy, and much more. Original..
